title: The hidden network that makes the internet possible - Sajan Saini

multiple-choice.question: What is the key phenomenon that enables fiber optic transmission?
What is the equivalent of 1 petabit of data in terms of high-definition video?
What is the main advantage of fiber optic signals compared to electrical signals?

options.label: C
options.text: They degrade less over long distances

multiple-choice.question: What is the name of the technology that uses ultrathin silicon wires to guide light?
What is the main problem with traditional electrical cables in data centers?

options.label: C
options.text: Half of their running power is wasted as heat

multiple-choice.question: What is the potential solution to breaking open wireless bandwidth limitations?
What is the main advantage of using photonic chips in data centers?

options.label: A
options.text: To carry data over long distances

options.label: B
options.text: To carry data at high speeds

options.label: C
options.text: To carry data thousands of times faster

options.label: D
options.text: To carry data over short distances
